name: Archery Madness VR
description:
Welcome to my first itch upload!!!

I'm so excited to introduce to you Archery Madness. The game involved 2 programmers, 3 designers and 4 artists that had a timespan of 4 weeks to develop the project.

My contributions to the project involved the interaction system between arrows and targets, the physics of the targets and the scoring system.

The game revolves around a torn down carnival setting in which the player discovers a operational archery game. In order to start the game, the player is needing to pick up the bow and arrow and shoot at a button to start the game.

In order to gain points, the player is needing to hit the same coloured bird with the same coloured arrow.

Hope you guys enjoy the game and any feedback would be appreciated.

Thanks' Guys
